work.summary: Working as part of the Jurisdiction Online team, providing regulatory services to state and local jurisdictions and insurance companies to process inspections, issues certificates for boilers, pressure vessels, elevators, and amusement rides.
highlights: Acquired by Aptean from Praeses, Continuing with the Jurisdiction Online team
Lead Developer for the Customer Success Team, addressing high priority customer requests using Kanban

highlights: Assisted with new invoice adjustments feature, including a updated interface for editing invoices

work.summary: Industry leading provider of HMIS case management software used by agencies and shelters to serve the homeless and any in need of assistance.
highlights: Acquired by Mediware in 2016, now a part of WellSky.
